desc: An innovative advance of conventional electrical muscle stimulation system for best results! Designed especially for Fitness Professionals! Our system lets you STAND OUT from the crowd and the best workout experience to your clients. And the best part, work for yourself! - Get a free demo today! No obligations!

layout.text: emsFX System® technology, which was previously reserved for elite athletes and the rehabilitation/physiotherapy field, now comes to the rest of the population in order to be able to achieve visible results quickly and easily.
